title.narrative: NGO Support / Ukraine gypsy community development programme

description.narrative: The community development program in Ukraine Carpathian region among the Roma villages designed to solve the problems of marginalized Roma people by improving their living conditions in their own place to live. The main objectives of the project is increas ed children's education housing conditions and living environment improvement life management and employment improvement. The project takes into account human rights by encouraging children and young people to educate themselves. Gender taken into account in improving girls' and women's position in the community and the decision-making. Environmental issues are taken into account by building wells and through the provision of waste management. HIV/AIDS are taken into account by providing health education wi th CDE-lessons. The project will develop an already existing structure and improve partner. The main beneficiaries are the target the Roma people in villages girls and boys women and man (about 4700 inhabitants of which the share of children is about 3000 850 women and 850 men). The main project activities are the community committee-workCDE-training construction team and the renovation of houses and the construction improvement of hygiene (clean water washing facilities and waste management project) litera cy education children's school support by influencing parents and teachers. The second phase of the project also aims to build a camp- and activity center that can host training and some else activitys. Yhdelle vahimista -organisation will buy the camp- an d activity center and the project will renovate facilities and arrange activies. The camp- and activity center will help the project relocate to the partner in the end of the project.
